actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: To clarify and extend the service area for the Sacramento Valley Canals, Central Valley project, California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Act reauthorizing the Central Valley project to include those portions of Yolo County within the boundaries of the Colusa County, Dunnigan, and Yolo-Zamora water districts within the service area for the Sacramento Valley Canals, California.

titles.title: To clarify and extend the service area for the Sacramento Valley Canals, Central Valley project, California, and for other purposes.
